function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Travel restrictions and social distancing impacting availability of inspectors and delivery staff","Impact":"Shortages of critical staff and transportation delays for perishable goods","Mitigation":"Implement remote inspection and delivery options, create backup staffing plans","Technologies":"Remote monitoring and delivery systems","People":"Inspectors, delivery staff, and consumers of perishable goods","Owner":"Supply chain managers, delivery companies, and government agencies"},{"Description":"Shutting down of floor trading impacting commodity exchange","Impact":"Inability to exchange commodities and resulting market instability","Mitigation":"Explore digital trading platforms, develop alternative trading mechanisms","Technologies":"Digital trading platforms, blockchain technology","People":"Traders, commodity exchange operators","Owner":"Market regulators, financial institutions"},{"Description":"Low levels of animal pharmaceuticals from large drug suppliers","Impact":"Potential shortage of animal pharmaceuticals","Mitigation":"Diversify pharmaceutical supply chain, stockpile critical medications","Technologies":"Supply chain management systems, stockpile management tools","People":"Veterinarians, animal pharmaceutical suppliers, pet owners","Owner":"Veterinary organizations, pharmaceutical companies"}]}
